pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, December 7, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.

11:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of Public Services and Procurement Anita Anand, Deputy Chief Public Health Officer Dr. Howard Njoo, and Major-General Dany Fortin will also be in attendance.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

Media appearance

6:00 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air on 105.3 The FOX.

8:30 p.m.  A pre-recorded interview with the Prime Minister on Canada’s response to COVID-19 will air as part of The Wall Street Journal’s CEO Council Summit event. Media can register to watch the interview by emailing steve.severinghaus@dowjones.com.
